### createMCSymbolForTlsGetAddr() {#abfcac3a9ee111cfe8a6df190086ca997}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MCSymbol &#42; createMCSymbolForTlsGetAddr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; Ctx, unsigned MIOpc)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This helper function creates the TlsGetAddr/TlsGetMod <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> for AIX.

We will create the csect and use the qual-name symbol instead of creating just the external symbol.

<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#a0bbac805be0153c6ba2c002e08a77388"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#a0bbac805be0153c6ba2c002e08a77388">PPCAsmPrinter::PrintAsmOperand</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpNo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;O) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Does this asm operand have a single letter operand modifier?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExtraCode &amp;&amp; ExtraCode&#91;0&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;L&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write second word of DImode reference.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).isReg() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++OpNo;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the high-part.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;I&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write &#39;i&#39; if an integer constant, otherwise nothing.  Used to print</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addi vs add, etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        O &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;i&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;x&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).isReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This operand uses VSX numbering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the operand is a VMX register, convert it to a VSX register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a5436d12d95e36064db97636d22f20988">PPC::isVRRegister</a>(Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Reg = PPC::VSX32 + (Reg - PPC::V0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#acc7a469d7d5e4183e2b84d15072786cf">PPC::isVFRegister</a>(Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Reg = PPC::VSX32 + (Reg - PPC::VF0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-TOC-based local-&#91;exec|dynamic&#93; variables that have a non-zero offset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to create a new MCExpr that adds the non-zero offset to the address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the local-&#91;exec|dynamic&#93; variable that will be used in either an addi,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load or store. However, the final displacement for these instructions must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between &#91;-32768, 32768), so if the TLS address + its non-zero offset is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FinalAddress &gt;= 32768) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the written offset for cases where:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   TLS variable address + Offset &gt; 32KB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The assembly that is printed will look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  TLSVar@le + Offset - Delta</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where Delta is a multiple of 64KB: ((FinalAddress + 32768) &amp; ~0xFFFF).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ptrdiff&#95;t Delta = ((FinalAddress + 32768) &amp; ~0xFFFF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the total instruction displacement fits within &#91;-32768,32768).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#91;&#91;maybe&#95;unused&#93;&#93; ptrdiff&#95;t InstDisp = TLSVarAddress + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((InstDisp &lt; 32768) &amp;&amp; (InstDisp &gt;= -32768)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting the instruction displacement for local-&#91;exec|dynamic&#93; TLS &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;variables to be between &#91;-32768, 32768)!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Expr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcbinaryexpr/#a3cbe1086ebf00680e8dc374e07305cfb">MCBinaryExpr::createAdd</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Expr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr/#af9bdc4c9c65ea1ff077fbbb6407d7b2a">MCConstantExpr::create</a>(-Delta, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa7625af893e242d33b9f182066f59310">OutContext</a>), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa7625af893e242d33b9f182066f59310">OutContext</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a7c9a3fd165029985d3d43de5226da4e3">PPCAsmPrinter::emitEndOfAsmFile</a>(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// EmitFunctionBodyStart - Emit a global entry point prefix for ELFv2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a0e3f4587b93083fdc01e3ec8f66b3701"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a0e3f4587b93083fdc01e3ec8f66b3701">PPCLinuxAsmPrinter::emitFunctionBodyStart</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the ELFv2 ABI, in functions that use the TOC register, we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// provide two entry points.  The ABI guarantees that when calling the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// local entry point, r2 is set up by the caller to contain the TOC base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for this function, and when calling the global entry point, r12 is set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up by the caller to hold the address of the global entry point.  We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thus emit a prefix sequence along the following lines:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// func:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lfunc&#95;gepNN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         # global entry point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         addis r2,r12,(.TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN)@ha</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         addi  r2,r2,(.TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN)@l</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lfunc&#95;lepNN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         .localentry func, .Lfunc&#95;lepNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         # local entry point, followed by function body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the Large code model, we create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lfunc&#95;tocNN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         .quad .TOC.-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN      # done by EmitFunctionEntryLabel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// func:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lfunc&#95;gepNN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         # global entry point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         ld    r2,.Lfunc&#95;tocNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN(r12)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         add   r2,r2,r12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lfunc&#95;lepNN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         .localentry func, .Lfunc&#95;lepNN-.Lfunc&#95;gepNN</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         # local entry point, followed by function body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This ensures we have r2 set up correctly while executing the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// body, no matter which entry point is called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a> &#42;PPCFI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getInfo&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UsesX2OrR2 = !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getRegInfo().use&#95;empty(PPC::X2) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getRegInfo().use&#95;empty(PPC::R2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PCrelGEPRequired = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                UsesX2OrR2 &amp;&amp; PPCFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6017bce5768f09c7cdbe312e90962dda">usesTOCBasePtr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NonPCrelGEPRequired = !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isELFv2ABI() &amp;&amp; UsesX2OrR2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only do all that if the function uses R2 as the TOC pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the first place. We don&#39;t need the global entry point if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function uses R2 as an allocatable register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NonPCrelGEPRequired || PCrelGEPRequired) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isUsingPCRelativeCalls()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When generating the entry point for a function we have a few scenarios</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on whether or not that function uses R2 and whether or not that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function makes calls (or is a leaf function).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) A leaf function that does not use R2 (or treats it as callee-saved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and preserves it). In this case st&#95;other=0 and both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the local and global entry points for the function are the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    No special entry point code is required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) A function uses the TOC pointer R2. This function may or may not have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    calls. In this case st&#95;other=&#91;2,6&#93; and the global and local entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    points are different. Code to correctly setup the TOC pointer in R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    is put between the global and local entry points. This case is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    covered by the if statatement above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) A function does not use the TOC pointer R2 but does have calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    In this case st&#95;other=1 since we do not know whether or not any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    of the callees clobber R2. This case is dealt with in this else if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    block. Tail calls are considered calls and the st&#95;other should also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    be set to 1 in that case as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4) The function does not use the TOC pointer but R2 is used inside</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the function. In this case st&#95;other=1 once again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 5) This function uses inline asm. We mark R2 as reserved if the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    has inline asm as we have to assume that it may be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getFrameInfo().hasCalls() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;getFrameInfo().hasTailCall() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a4ddb4afaf5e4a6bca81ececd63f516da">MF</a>-&gt;hasInlineAsm() || (!PPCFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6017bce5768f09c7cdbe312e90962dda">usesTOCBasePtr</a>() &amp;&amp; UsesX2OrR2)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer">PPCTargetStreamer</a> &#42;TS =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer">PPCTargetStreamer</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;getTargetStreamer());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetstreamer/#a9a17fcc857e0a6ffca2cb0b635394beb">emitLocalEntry</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MCSymbolELF&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa06f7388d0cc9b44ece08cdf56c0ecf0">CurrentFnSym</a>),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// EmitFunctionBodyEnd - Print the traceback table before the .size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// directive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a4f7d295492d6b2992bc084b59a00557c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppclinuxasmprinter/#a4f7d295492d6b2992bc084b59a00557c">PPCLinuxAsmPrinter::emitFunctionBodyEnd</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only the 64-bit target requires a traceback table.  For now,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we only emit the word of zeroes that GDB requires to find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the end of the function, and zeroes for the eight-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mandatory fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We should fill in the eight-byte mandatory fields as described in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the PPC64 ELF ABI (this is a low-priority item because GDB does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently make use of these fields).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcasmprinter-cpp-/ppcasmprinter/#ae2d680022bd0368819b4d6f511765a13">Subtarget</a>-&gt;isPPC64()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3284" lineLink="#aae503fa1c7f4a8a7c5e372e0948ab4f8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string <a href="#aae503fa1c7f4a8a7c5e372e0948ab4f8">convertToSinitPriority</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Priority) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This helper function converts clang init priority to values used in sinit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and sterm functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The conversion strategies are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We map the reserved clang/gnu priority range &#91;0, 100&#93; into the sinit/sterm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reserved priority range &#91;0, 1023&#93; by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - directly mapping the first 21 and the last 20 elements of the ranges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - linear interpolating the intermediate values with a step size of 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We map the non reserved clang/gnu priority range of &#91;101, 65535&#93; into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sinit/sterm priority range &#91;1024, 2147483648&#93; by:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - directly mapping the first and the last 1024 elements of the ranges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - linear interpolating the intermediate values with a step size of 33878</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="#af564596581c06587b39c6a9cae3a859d">mapToSinitPriority</a>(Priority);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string PrioritySuffix;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-string-ostream">llvm::raw&#95;string&#95;ostream</a> os(PrioritySuffix);</span></CodeLine>
